hello there: today i install ubuntu with windowsXP on my desktop machine with 2 seperate HDD for both OS (NO DUEL BOOT), when log into ubuntu it shows correct time and date but when log in to windowsXP the time is 5 hours behind, shows 5 hour difference, why is that? how to correct this problem?
you choosed during ubuntu install to set bios to utc time; didn't you?
In /etc/default/rcS you can set UTC to no to make linux "respect" the (wrong) windows time
should work out of the box... does it show in "iwconfig" output?

well you have a wlan0 so your wifi card is working
but the light is OFF, the wirless adaptor light is switched OFF and i tried to turn it ON but failed what to do then
sudo iwlist wlan0 scan
it says " wlan0     Interface doesn't support scanning : Network is down "
do "sudo ifconfig wlan0 up"
